metadata.title: CVE-2017-12141 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
In ytnef 1.9.2, a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability was found in thefunction TNEFFillMapi in ytnef.c, which allows attackers to cause a denialof service via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.3-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.3-1').
